import{combineReducers}from'redux';import{connectRouter}from'connected-react-router';//
import{history}from'../routes/urlLocations';import{LOGOUT}from'./logout/logout.action';import initialState from'../store/initialState';var appReducer=combineReducers({router:connectRouter(history)});var rootReducers=function rootReducers(state,action){if(action.type===LOGOUT){state=initialState;}return appReducer(state,action);};export default rootReducers;
